ticket.title: rdoc links to symbols not rendered into html properly
ticket.original-body:
The html generated by rdoc for rails is incorrrect when processing a link to a symbol. For example the rdoc in the source file: activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb for the with_scope method has this section: @@@ ruby # *Note*: the +:find+ scope also has effect on update and deletion methods, # like +update_all+ and +delete_all+. @@@ Rdoc creates links for all three terms bracketed by "+" characters but the html generated for: +:find+ looks like this: +:find+ instead of this: :find The html rendered for the entire paragraph looks like this:

Note: the +:find+ scope also has effect on update and deletion methods, like update_all and delete_all.

The html generated by rdoc for rails is incorrrect when processing a link to a symbol.

For example the rdoc in the source file:

activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb

for the with_scope method has this section:


  # *Note*: the +:find+ scope also has effect on update and deletion methods,

  </p>
